document.full_text: u.s. highway travel declined 1.4 percent in march from a year ago as gasoline prices rose, marking the first year-on-year decline in the number of miles driven in 13 months, the u.s. transportation department said on friday.
document.title: u.s. drives less for first time in 13 months
lines_and_colors: u.s. highway travel declined 1.4 percent in march from a year ago as gasoline prices rose, marking the first year-on-year decline in the number of miles driven in 13 months, the u.s. transportation department said on friday.
